description:
The prestigious Koyomi Academy... The newly elected members of the student council was all that was being talked about at school. All of the members are handsome, but the one who was getting the most attention was the president, J. He had only recently transferred to the school and was elected student council president, which was rather unprecedented. J was somewhat of an idol to all of the girls at the school. However, he had a secret that no one knew about. And for some reason, he was trying to find out more about a man named Hayakawa...
Source: crunchyroll
